product_page.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
benefits: Reduces appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
product_page.how_to_use: Apply 2-3 drops to face and neck after toning, before moisturizing. Use morning and night for optimal results.
product_page.safety_information: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

differences.benefits: GlowBoost focuses on brightening, SkinRevive on hydration

comparison_page.recommendation: Choose SkinRevive for hydration and budget-friendliness
